description: Surrogate unique identifier for this cross-reference row; primary key used internally.
Date-time when the cross-reference was created or last updated, stored as a compact numeric string (likely yyyymmddhhmmssmmm); confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the cross-reference, such as applicability, vendor details, or exceptions.
Identifier of the alternate/equivalent part linked to the primary part; references the parts inventory.
Name of the referenced table containing the alternate/equivalent part (e.g., parts inventory); supports dynamic foreign-key resolution.
Identifier of the primary part for which alternates/equivalents are maintained; references the parts inventory.
Name of the referenced table containing the primary part (e.g., parts inventory); used to resolve the foreign key.
Key value from the legacy source system for lineage/migration back-reference; format and meaning may vary by source; confirm with SME.
Name of the legacy source table that supplied this record, enabling traceability to the original system.
